data.text: @greg_travis @schmangee Can I assume the CFR is based on conflating died of covid and died with covid?
@schmangee Slightly misleading because we had more than zero deaths in the young from covid-- I know it works with your per 100,000 but that implies purely zero
@schmangee Think you mean the only age group not subject to COVID protections https://t.co/Di8MfXfnWA
@schmangee Don’t forget college aged kids. Many colleges still requiring.
@BethOsborneT4A @DL_138 I think they also wanted to control for a “normal” year
@DL_138 @schmangee The 2020 crash data just landed last Thu, so it is hard to match directly.
@schmangee Vaccine mandates are still required at many colleges and also by many employers still.

@schmangee Kind of big leap. So right wingers didn’t trust the govt on vaccines, which they should have. Had they done so our problems would be much more mild. Then when the govt manages to that lowest common denominator you blame the govt. Nice!
@schmangee College students too! University of Michigan still mandating masks and boosters to attend. Check out requirements for gradation at the end of April https://t.co/7xEDsTYqh1
